Detailed Description

Data class for storing device profile information (a.k.a SEP data).

This class stores device profile information which is the result of a successful device registration performed via Agent::createDevice().

A device profile is also known as a SEP (Secure Enrollment Profile).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ DeviceProfile() [1/2]

IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfile::DeviceProfile ( )

Initializes the object to be empty.

Creation time in seconds is initialized to be zero.

Property Documentation

◆ CreationTimestampSecs

long IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfile::CreationTimestampSecs
getset

The time at which this profile was created in seconds.

Returns
Returns creation time in UTC seconds since January 1, 1970.

◆ DeviceId

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfile::DeviceId
getset

The device profile ID.

This device ID is generated by Ionic.com during registration that is performed by calling Agent::CreateDevice().
